main.name: Sari Stissi
main.description: Currently I'm working at On Earth Peace where I am facilitating a data migration from Salesforce to NationBuilder and conceptualizing, designing, product managing, and developing an app or suite of apps to help boost interaction with the organization
main.bio1: I'm a recent graduate of a top-tier liberal arts college with experience in software engineering, front-end web development, app development, game design/development, UX/UI development, machine learning, large-scale event planning/organizing, and digital organizing.
main.bio2: Computer Science is such a broad field, which is why I spend my time gaining experience in different aspects. Learning different disciplines helps you do better work when you focus on one type of project because now you have multiple perspectives and outside of the box skills to use.
main.bio3: I love exploring new technologies, languages, and skills in the computer science realm and out of that realm. I've learned a lot about cooking, wine tasting, lobbying, activism, history, ancient and classical studies, and so much more. I also play rugby and soccer and love being on a team.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
